_88unrecognized_output.description: Unrecognized output from a future minor-revision to the notebook format.

_88stream.description: Stream output from a code cell.

___name.description: The name of the stream (stdout, stderr).

___text.description: The stream's text output, represented as an array of strings.

_88error.description: Output of an error that occurred during code cell execution.

___traceback.description: The error's traceback, represented as an array of strings.

___evalue.description: The value, or message, of the error.

metadata_name.description: The cell's name. If present, must be a non-empty string.

metadata_tags.description: The cell's tags. Tags must be unique, and must not contain commas.

source.description: Contents of the cell, represented as an array of lines.

___nbformat.description: Notebook format (major number). Incremented between backwards incompatible changes to the notebook format.

___cells.description: Array of cells of the current notebook.

___nbformat_minor.description: Notebook format (minor number). Incremented for backward compatible changes to the notebook format.

___orig_nbformat.description: Original notebook format (major number) before converting the notebook between versions. This should never be written to a file.

___name.description: The programming language which this kernel runs.

___mimetype.description: The mimetype corresponding to files in this language.

___file_extension.description: The file extension for files in this language.

___codemirror_mode.description: The codemirror mode to use for code in this language.

___pygments_lexer.description: The pygments lexer to use for code in this language.
